accommodations.name: Hotel Garni Almhof - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Alpine bliss! The Almhof sits in a meadow in Mayrhofen, surrounded by magnificent mountain views. Just a short stroll from the centre of the festival and the main ski lifts, you can escape the madness in minutes to chill on your balcony and watch the sun set behind the Penken, or relax in the reading lounge - with free WiFi. Ohh la la.

Each room is kitted out with a TV, hairdryer, safe, telephone and balcony overlooking Mayrhofen’s snow-capped mountains and the new spa area comes equipped with a Finnish sauna, steam bath and a gym.

If you want great value, centrally located traditional Austrian accommodation with clean and simple Tyrolean themed décor, then look no further than the Almhof…

accommodations.name: Hotel Alpina - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
A typically Tyrolean, small family run guesthouse located in the farming community of Swendau which offers a warm welcome and true Tyrolean hospitality like no other…

The rich breakfast buffet is the basis for a big day pummelling the piste. Spoil yourself and enjoy doing nothing in our sauna area: Finnish Sauna, Aroma-steam and sauna! All of the core venues including, The Racket Club, Forest Party, Street Party and Brück’n Stadl are only a short drive away on the free ski bus, which scoots directly into the centre of town to take you from pillow to piste to party and back again.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Brucke - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description: Location! Location! Location! Ideal for hitting the slopes or slinking into bed at the crack of dawn, the hugely popular Hotel Brucke stands at the top of the main high street - literally attached to the Bruck n’ Stadl club venue and less than two minutes from both of the in town ski lifts. The Brucke has a gorgeous spa area complete with a steam room, Finnish sauna and Kneipp pool for the morning after. All single, twin and triple rooms have an en-suite, telephone, TV, hairdryer, safe and balcony. If you’re looking for affordable luxury with the perfect location – the search is over! Take heed though ‘bombers, these rooms fly out quicker than a tray of free Jaegers in the Ice Bar…

accommodations.name: Hotel Christlwirt - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
The Hotel Christlwirt, situated in the typically Austrian village of Hippach, offers a great value valley bed within a cat’s whisker of the free bus stops to the Mayrhofen resort.

The Hotel offers you delightful en-suite rooms, a large lounge, TV room, garden, bar and rooms with radio SAT-TV and telephone, and more shiny pine than Mr Sheen.

All of our unique venues, including The Racket Club, Forest Party, Street Party and Brück’n Stadl are only a short drive away on the free ski bus! The regular ski bus runs directly into the centre of town to take you from pillow to piste to party and back again so you are never far away! Plus it runs all day & night so you will never miss out on the action.

accommodations.name: Country Denggerhof  - Downtown - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description: The ambiance of Landhotel Denggerhof is reflected in every guestroom. Shower, balcony/terrace, in room safe, television, satellite/cable TV are just some of the facilities at your disposal. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. When you are looking for comfortable and convenient accommodations in Mayrhofen make Landhotel Denggerhof your perfect base for ‘bombing brilliance…

accommodations.name: Hotel Eckartauerhof - Downtown - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description:
BARGAIN ALERT! On the sunny side of the gorgeous Ziller Valley, situated in a quiet hamlet, a quick 5 minute bus ride away from Mayrhofen, with en-suite balcony rooms (safe, TV, hairdryer and telephone with wireless internet available from in the restaurant) you’ll awaken to a generous breakfast buffet, relax in the sauna, before hopping on the free shuttle bus stop which stops practically outside…the Eckartauerhof is a great choice for budget conscious ‘bombers who love a bit of local ambience…

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Edelweiss - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
The Edelweiss puts you virtually on the doorstep of some of the best Snowbombing venues - just 2 minutes to the Racket Club and 5 minutes to the Arena. It’s also just a short stumble to and from the Penken cable car, so you’ve got the best of both worlds!

Staying at the Edelweiss is also good for post piste feasts… Check out the giant pizza that serves 4, as well as the infamous Edelweiss Burger and some fancy homemade cocktails. Rooms are en suite and the downstairs cafe sells some of the best cakes in town.

If you want to be in the centre of the action, then this is the place for you but get it booked quickly as it’s always a ridiculously popular choice…

accommodations.name: Hotel Edenlehen - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Luxurious spa facilities, good grub in the renowned restaurant and just a short skip to the Bruck n’ Stadl, Ahorn and Penken ski lifts, The Edenlehen is an ideal choice for 'up for it' Snowbombers, who also need a bit of R&R. You’ll be able to unwind after a long day up the mountain in the outdoor heated swimming pool or perhaps in the spa complete with a steam room, vitamin bar, marble crystals, solarium and infrared cabin… The Edenlehen rooms have stunning views of Mayrhofen, many complete with balconies. If it’s ‘party and pamper’ you are looking for, then look no further…

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Eder Ferienanlag - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
Both bling-tastic and appealingly quiet, this is a great option for groups who want easy mountain access without the queuing - the Hotel is situated close to both the ski bus stops serving Horberg/Mayrhofen and the Tux Glacier. Facilities boast a great wellness /sauna area and super a la carte restaurant to create a superior valley experience, the Eder Ferianlag is a suitable choice for the discerning Snowbomber.

Expect panoramic mountain vistas frome ach window, en suite bathrooms and all the trappings of a really solid 4* Hotel, including a seriously tasty restuarant on the ground floor. A solid choice! Please note; you must remove all of your clothing in order to use the sauna facilities at this hotel.

accommodations.name: Hotel Forsthaus zum Kramerwirt - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Opposite the panoramic 4* Hotel Kramerwirt and run by the same family, you can expect the same charming high level of quality at this sister setting, the Hotel Forsterhaus zum Kramerwirt. Staying here means you can wine and dine in the Kramerwirt and enjoy its roof terrace bar, equipped with those amazing mountain views as well as the spa, steam bath and whirlpool.

Each room has an en-suite bathroom, telephone, TV, sitting area, free Wi-Fi and either a balcony or terrace access. This excellent newly renovated hotel is centrally located so all of your 'bombing needs are just a snowball’s through away.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Garni Erler - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
In a quiet location and just a 5 min walk from the centre of Mayrhofen, Hotel Garni Erler is a short ski bus ride from the Penkenbahn Cable Car and the Zillertal 3000 Ski Area. All rooms and apartments have a balcony overlooking the Zillertal Alps and a regular ski bus stops 100 yards away. Sounds pretty perfect, huh? Well read on... The Erler Hotel’s spa area features a Finnish sauna, a steam bath, an infrared cabin, a sun bed, and a relaxation room decorated with Swarovski crystals. Ooooh! A fitness room and table tennis facilities are also on site... Seriously how could this get better? Well the ski storage room with a ski boot dryer, perfect for when you've been drenched on the piste, as you can imagine, this one tends to go pretty fast.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Garni Glockenstuhl - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
At this family-run hotel in Mayrhofen, you’ll experience a comfortable, cozy atmosphere that's perfect for recharging your batteries before each night. Are you in the mood for nature and outdoor activities, or simply to unwind? No matter what the case, this sunny, peaceful location in the centre of Mayrhofen is practically ideal. And every day gets off to a successful start with a sumptuous breakfast rich in variety.

The new Wellness Oasis, with a Finnish sauna, pine sauna, aroma steam bath, infrared sauna, fresh-air room, spa showers and quiet room, creates the perfect ambience in which to relax after a big one at the Mountain Stage…

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hubers Boutique - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Huber´s Boutique hotel is a small green oasis that’s right in the centre of Mayrhofen, and both cable cars are 2 minutes away. Newly rebuilt, clean lines set the tone – it is what it is – discreet luxury.

It’s a bit of a party hotel for those that want to be close to all the action, but also fancy a plush pad. The hotel offers comfortable and spacious en-suite rooms, all with their own balcony from where you can enjoy wonderful views of the mountains. Other facilities include SAT-TV, safe, minibar, phone and hair dryer.

Huber’s Boutique hotel also features an incredible Wellness Centre, featuring Finnish sauna, Relaxation room, Steam bath, an Ice fountain and an outdoor area, with massages available on request.

*Please note you must remove all of your clothing in order to use the sauna facilities at this hotel.

accommodations.name: Hotel Jagerhof  - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
You’ll find the über popular Jaegerhof at the top of town, just an 8 minute walk to the Penken and Ahorn ski lifts and with the Bruck’n’Stadl only a snowball’s throw away. Rooms come complete with an en-suite, hairdryer, TV, telephone, safe, free Wi-Fi and limited free parking - especially handy if you are arriving on the SB Road Trip!

Hard day on the slopes? Relax in the Jaegerhof’s spa area, the ‘Wildes Tirol’ before heading to the hotel restaurant, known across town for its tasty traditional Austrian cuisine before shooting to the bar… Afterall, the Jaegerhof got it’s name for a reason.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Kumbichlhof Patriazia - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description: A warm and cosy hotel located in the natural reserve of the Zillertal Alps, the Kumbichlhof Patriaza is the perfect 3* for those looking to keep things nice and simple at Snowbombing. The surrounding mountains offer gorgeous views, rooms are well equipped and fully furnished and there is a cracking continental breakfast served every morning. Each room has a balcony, giving you the chance to breathe in that unbeatable mountain air... There is a free ski bus that will take you from pillow to piste to party and back again, so you’re never far from the action.

accommodations.name: Landhaus Carla  - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Just off the main street with great views of the valley and mountains, Landhaus Carla is one for those who want an occasional escape from the madness. A high standard 3* with spa facilities, a great restaurant and just walking distance from the lifts and all the core SB venues, you really can't beat the Landhaus Carla for an impeccable location.

Rooms are all en suite with TVs, hairdryers and most have balconies boasting stunning views of the valley. Many Snowbombers return year on year to the Carla, as it's run by a friendly and snow-mad family (her son Tommy “Beckna” Erberharter is the one of the most famous snowboarders in Europe). A very solid choice for your stay with us at Snowbombing...

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Sporthotel Manni - In Town - Central Mayrhofen - 4* FAVOURITE
accommodations.description:
If you manage to grab a room in the Mannis, you are officially a BALLER. Mayrhofen’s coolest hotel contains beautifully designed rooms, an award winning restaurant with the best steak in town and best of all… A rooftop pool and jacuzzi with the greatest mountainous view since Cliffhanger.

Located right on the main High St, it’s nestled in between all of the best Snowbombing venues and just a stone’s throw away from the Penken ski lift. The Hotel Mannis is a one-stop shop to ensuring the best week of your life at Snowbombing, trust.

accommodations.name: Mountain and Soul LifeStyle Hotel - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
This 3* is a little more modern than the traditional Tyrolean hotels of Mayrhofen, kitted out with colourful spacious twin rooms. The terrace is one of the coolest hot spots in the Ziller Valley with boundless panoramic views and famously tasty homemade cocktails.

Don’t forget to take an afternoon off from the slopes (and the Jager) to enjoy the Finnish panorama sauna, mirrored with thermal glass ordering an amazing view of the majestic Mayrhofen mountains… A hotel full of life and character and a strong choice for your week with us in the ‘hof.

accommodations.name: Hotel Neue Post   - In Town - Central Mayrhofen - 4* FAVOURITE
accommodations.description:
Competing for the crown of Mayrhofen’s loveliest 4* Hotel, the Neue Post boasts to be the no.1 bed of choice for Snowbombing’s guests, DJs and bands alike - Skream even played a secret set last year! Located right next to the headline venues and just a short stroll to the Penken cable car, you’re in the sweetest spot in town and that’s not all… The Neue Post features an enormous 1000m2 wellness spa area, featuring a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, infrared and light therapy, a “shower temple”, oxygen therapy, and even a relaxation room by a waterfall! The hotel also has a solarium, a fitness centre, a big garden with a heated, glass-covered pool (open all year) and a sunbathing lawn. It’s basically your one-stop shop to pure indulgence and luxury whilst in the ‘hof…

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Neuhaus - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
The Neuhaus is like all your hopes and dreams of Snowbombing accommodation rolled into one: A traditional Austrian hotel snugly slotted in the heart of Mayrhofen’s town centre. Just steps away from the ski lift and all your favourite SB venues, the Neuhaus is packed with Hot Tubs, Saunas and Steam Baths and more, whilst the hotel also boasts an excellent wine cellar, offers guided walks of the town and mountain, and even contains a small cinema, bowling alley and billiards table. If you’re looking for a fun, in town hotel for you and your gang, look no further…

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Pension Auf Der Wiese - Downtown - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description:
Bags of character is an understatement… An authentic Austrian traditional guesthouse surrounded by its own meadows but still pretty central in location, The Auf Der Wiese (translation: ‘pointed to the’) is rumoured to be precisely aligned with the setting sun... This is a great crib for Snowbombers who want stunning scenery and cosy rooms, complete with balconies so you can sit back and relax after a hard day on the piste or a night on the tiles.

A bit of a well-kept secret, the Wiese is both pocket friendly and very comfortable. What are you waiting for?

accommodations.name: Pension Birkenhof - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
One of our most iconic cribs, this traditional and very central Tyrolean guesthouse offers terrific value for money and stunning alpine views. Family-owned, the Birkenhof is a popular place to stay for Snowbombers seeking a slice of the real Austria but still close to party central. Like Helmut the gardener, rooms are rustic and simple (though unlike Helmut, they are cleaned daily!)… Think the ‘Sound of Music’ with Wi-Fi and great breakfasts!

Each room has been newly refurbished to top traditional Tyrolean style and is equipped with an en-suite, hairdryer, small living area, TV, safe and a large balcony.

accommodations.name: Pension Gasthaus Hauser (Alpina) - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description: The Gasthaus Alpina sits just outside the noise and madness of the ‘Hof. This hillside guest house is as Austrian as Arnold Schwarzenegger’s lederhosen and boasts magnificent views of lush green meadows and stunning mountain scenery. Rooms are all en-suite and most have brilliant balconies. Awesomely authentic and just a short bus ride away from the queue free Horberg lift on the free ski bus, the Hauser Alpina has charm aplenty. Not to mention the great sauna and solarium too! The regular ski bus stops right outside and runs directly into the centre of town to take you from pillow to piste, party and back again so you are never far away…

accommodations.name: Pension Gastehaus Pendl - Downtown - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description:
Grab some serious R&R away from the festival madness at the Pension Pendl with its ideal location in the pretty hamlet of Hollenzen, near Mayrhofen. All our headline venues and the main ski lifts are only a few minutes away on the free ski bus, so whether you want to relax, or take in the Austrian culture (there’s more to Zillertal than Hans the Butcher!) there’s plenty for everyone to enjoy their Snowbombing holiday…

Rooms in this pension offer shower/WC, satellite TV and a balcony. There is also a cosy Tyrolean-style lounge, a kitchenette and a heated ski storage room. Fancy.

Serene and quiet, great after a day on the piste when you really need to get your head down! There's a free ski bus nearby that takes you around town in minutes so you can go from pillow to piste to party and back again with ease. This comfy bnb also has gym facilities, free Wi-Fi, ski storage, a cosy living area and all rooms have private balconies. An excellent choice all round…

accommodations.name: Pension Kassnerhof - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description: A pretty guesthouse in a great location - the Kassnerhof is just a short stumble from the Racket Club and the Fun Haus. It was once a farmhouse and still carries the charm of that era into the present day. The interior has wooden beams and panelling steeped in traditional Austrian culture, with comfortable bedrooms and a sunny breakfast room. Best of all, it’s surrounded by the lush meadows so you can get your head down and escape the madness at the end of the night. An über lovely spot…

accommodations.name: Pension Rosenhof - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
The Rosenhof is another one of Mayrhofen’s best-kept secrets. It's only a few minutes from the train station and close to the Horberg ski bus stop - ideally situated to hare up the mountain in the morning. This self-catering accommodation will put you within easy striking range of all of Snowbombing’s nocturnal delights, with The Racket Club a 5 minute walk away and The Arena is just a 10 minute stroll! Most rooms are en-suite with a balcony, satellite TV and come with a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, dishwasher and dining area.

The Rosenhof will sell out pretty rapidly due to its perfect location and great amenities – so bag it while you can.

accommodations.name: Hotel Ramsauerhof - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
This majestic, classically styled 4 * hotel possesses everything you’ll need to do Snowbombing in style - sauna, sun terrace, solarium, gym and swimming pool, plus large en suite rooms, each with a balcony offering amazing views of the surrounding peaks. Its sunny location means you’ll probably spend as much time in the sun garden, swimming pool and spa as you will falling over on the piste. All rooms are en-suite with balconies. An added extra is the sound proof windows, for when you really need that little bit of rest… it helps, trust us.

There is a regular free shuttle bus that runs directly into the centre of town to take you from pillow to piste, party and back again in only 8 minutes so you are never far away.

Please note; you must remove all of your clothing in order to use the sauna facilities at this hotel.

accommodations.name: Hotel Robert - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
The Hotel Robert offers alpine charm by the bucketful, a picturesque 4* hotel located in a scenic Mayrhofen location. Just a short and sweet 10-minute walk from the Forest Party and the Pool Party and a 10-minute walk from the ski lifts, the Robert is tucked away from the madness of the main high street but still conveniently close to the cable cars. All rooms come complete with a living room, en-suite, hairdryer, TV, telephone, safe and a balcony with a small terrace. The fantastic spa and well-being centre will make you feel 100% again the morning after and so will the bakery on the ground floor… High-end Heaven!

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

The Rose has a charming farm-style lounge, a bar and terrace, a lift, and a very handy ping pong table - perfect for tournaments with fellow Snowbombers. It’s only a 5-minute stroll to the Penken ski lift and within minutes of The Racket Club, making it a perfect Snowbombing location! If you’re lucky you’ll also get to sample their delicious a la carte buffet service.

accommodations.description:
The beating heart of Snowbombing and the no. 1 destination for artists, press, VIPs and party starters alike. The Hotel Strass is at the epicentre of everything during Snowbombing week… Its location is unbeatable: right next door to the Penkenbahn ski lift, opposite Hans the Butcher, and the home of 3 Snowbombing club venues – The Arena, Ice Bar and Sports Bar (perfect for watching the footie). That’s not all… The Strass boasts a superb spa and wellness area, gym, sauna, steam room, swimming pool, and a set of masseurs who’ll pound your piste-weary bones into submission (in a good way…) Long live the Hotel Strass.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Strolz - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
The Hotel Strolz is located just a snowballs throw away (around 300 metres - granted that’s a big throw) from one of Snowbombing’s headlining venues, The Racket Club. Say hello to Frau Strolz, who prides herself on the comfort she provides at her lovely traditional hotel, which boasts some great features: an indoor swimming pool and the fabulous 'Sauna World’, one of Mayrhofen’s best spas (and that’s really saying something.)

All bedrooms pack a private shower, hairdryer, safe, satellite TV and most have a balcony. With a pool, mini golf, bicycle rental and dry heat sauna, this hotel is perfect if you want to be able to escape and relax as much as you want to party.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Zillertalerhof - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description: Situated smack bang in the centre of Mayrhofen, the Zillertalhof boasts an incredible heated indoor and outdoor pool, steam bath and a fantastic Finnish sauna. There is a ski bus stop just outside the building if you fancy taking a trip out of town, and free limited parking on site, perfect for those on the Road Trip. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and most boast scenic views that will truly take your breath away. The restaurant serves a delicious buffet breakfast, with fresh local ingredients bought each morning and some good vegetarian options too. Massages and beauty treatments are available on request! Ask for Ingrid…

accommodations.description:
Located right next to the Racket Club and opposite SBHQ, this 4* favourite hotel is perfect for those that know how to session Snowbombing in serious style… All of the spacious rooms and suites have balconies, solid wooden furniture and big bathrooms with hairdryers and free toiletries. It features a superb spa area complete with a Finnish sauna, steam bath, sauna and a hot tub and sun beds, whilst fitness facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, squash and tennis courts with views of the gorgeous Zillertal valley. This is a top hotel for guests and artists alike, so you may find yourself in the sauna with Fatboy Slim, or waiting for the toast machine behind David Rodigan… No joke.

accommodations.name: 3 Bed Apartment - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Don’t delay, these get snapped up quicker than Carl Cox on a downhill toboggan! Great for groups who fancy a pocket-friendly, self-catering trip (the Austrian Supermarkets are mega cheap) - whether you’re travelling in a trio or rolling deep with your 10 best pals, we have apartments to suit each and every party size!

Apartments comprise of Austrian twin beds, bunk beds, sofa beds, fully equipped kitchens and living areas perfect for pre-drinks. Some apartments also have a balcony available on a first come first served basis, so gather the troops quickly! We cannot guarantee that everyone will have a separate bedroom area, so flip a coin for the sofa beds!

Like a fine wine or a tin of Quality Street, Snowbombing is best shared. Hurry – apartments will be allocated on a first-come-first-served basis.

*Please note that the images shown are representative of the accommodation available but may not be the apartment you are allocated and layouts may vary.

Due to demand and variation of layout, if larger apartments are booked and at the time of allocation we are unable to accommodate your group size, you will be allocated separate apartments.

accommodations.description:
These apartments are great for groups who fancy a pocket-friendly, self-catering trip (the Austrian Supermarkets are mega cheap), if you'd prefer to blow your budget on bottles rather than beds! Whether you’re travelling in a quad or perhaps a dream team of 9, we have apartments to suit each and every party size!

Zillertal Valley apartments are located in the beautiful surrounding valleys of Mayrhofen, including Hippach, Ramsau and Schwendau, approx 3-5km away from the action. With free ski buses running regularly, you can be taken from piste to party to pillow and back again easily.

Apartments comprise of Austrian twin beds, bunk beds, sofa beds, a fully equipped kitchen and living areas perfect for pre-drinks. Some apartments also have a balcony available on a first-come-first-served basis, so gather the troops quickly! We cannot guarantee that everyone will have a separate bedroom area, so flip a coin for the sofa beds!

Like a fine wine or a tin of Quality Street, Snowbombing is best shared.

Hurry – apartments will be allocated on a first come first served basis.

*Please note that the images shown are representative of the accommodation available but may not be the apartment you are allocated and layouts may vary.

Due to demand and variation of layout, if larger apartments are booked and at the time of allocation we are unable to accommodate, your group size you will be allocated separate apartments.

accommodations.name: Landhaus Roscher - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
The Landhaus Roscher is a 5 min walk from the main high street, gondolas and rest of the Strass complex, and situated on the edge of the forest, which holds the famed Friday night Forest Party. If you go down to the woods today… Stay in a lovely guesthouse!

The Roscher is a 2* family place with spacious rooms including en-suite and traditional decor, breakfast is served in the Landhaus and not the main Strass Hotel.

Guests at the Landhaus Roscher are invited to share some of the main hotels 4* facilities including pool and textile sauna.

accommodations.name: Villa and Aparthotel Strass - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
A stone’s throw from the main Strass building and it also shares its facilities, the Villa Strass is an excellent choice with a front door that opens to the bottom of the main gondola station in town. It literally could not be better situated in order to bring the very best from Snowbombing.

The Strass empire is an awesome axis of accommodation and much, much more. It's the eye at the centre of the Snowbombing storm: 400 4 star beds, 2 swimming pools a panoramic gym and stupendous spa area (in which you can keep your swimming stuff ON!), a dozen bars (including the fave hang out of our artists, the Lobby Bar, the Sports Bar and Arena), a sun-kissed lawn and more balconies than the "Balconies R Us Boxing Day Sale".

Twin and triple rooms are spacious, have en suites with tasteful, traditional decor and the buffet breakfast is vast. In the time you've read this, someone else has just booked a room, so stop reading, take our word for it and reserve a slice of the Strass for yourself and your legs will love you for it (if your pillow was any nearer the Penken lift, you'd need a lift pass to go to bed!)

accommodations.name: Gasthof Zillertal - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
The Gasthof is Mayrhofen's very own snowboarders and skiers specialist hotel!

Fitted with a tuning room to keep your board in top condition and an in-house test centre with all the new Lobster, Switchback and Bataleon gear, it also boasts several types of accommodation that will fit any budget and its own restaurant that will keep you well fed and fit for shredding up the Hintertux. Don’t even think of doubting the fantastic facilities in this place…

Mayrhofen town is only a short walking distance away, free transport to the ski lift stops right in front of the building and will take you to the great ski area and heart of town so you can grab the best of the action and all headline venues within minutes! Arriving at the Gasthof is better than coming home…

*Please note guests are required to pay a €50 deposit on arrival in cash.

accommodations.name: Guesthouse Bruggerhof
accommodations.description: This lovely, newly renovated guesthouse boasts traditional Tyrolean charm (well, it is Mayrhofen) in a blissfully quiet spot, at the same time as being located only a short stroll from the centre of Mayrhofen and the Penkenbahn Ski Lift. Perfect for groups of two to six, the Bruggerhof is the ideal HQ to session Snowbombing in serious style.

accommodations.name: Oblasser Ferienhof - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description: Furnished in traditional Tyrolean style, this holiday house has all the amenities of a much larger hotel. The 3-star house offers a cosy lounge with an open fireplace, a breakfast room, an entertainment room with bar, a heated ski room and a wellness centre. Mayrhofen can be reached on foot in about 15 minutes or the ski bus stops directly in front of the house. Easy choice, really.

accommodations.name: Life & Spa Hotel Stefanie - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
Life & Spa Hotel Stefanie in Hippach is idyllically nestled between the two largest ski areas in the beautiful Zillertal. The 35 rooms and suites of the family-operated hotel are finished individually with painstaking attention to detail – from rural and rustic to minimalist and modern. The new, light-flooded panorama suites with balconies offer an incomparable view of the mountains around the Zillertal. At the Senses Spa, an indoor pool, aqua and spirit whirlpool, Swiss stone pine waterbed and different saunas offer quiet and relaxation. After a big day on the mountain, the garden and wine lounge are the perfect place to unwind in serious style…

The Racket Club, Forest Party, Street Party and Bruck’n Stadl are only a short drive away on the free ski bus, which runs directly into the centre of town to take you from pillow to piste, party and back again.

Please note, you must remove all of your clothing in order to use the sauna facilities at this hotel.

accommodations.name: Kiendlerhof  - Out of Town - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description: Overlooking the beautiful Mayrhofen countryside, the Kiendlerhof is easily accessible via the regular ski buses that stop right outside. The comfortable rooms are tastefully decorated in a traditional style, many with stunning views of the valley. Their rich breakfast buffet is the ideal way to prep for a big day on the piste, and you'll simply love staying in such a living tribute to Tyrolean culture and traditions. Excellent for couples looking for a slightly more quiet location or those looking to immerse themselves in the history of this stunning region, as you’ll be staying on what is essentially a working farm! An awesome choice for those that really want to experience authentic Austrian culture whilst at Snowbombing, yah?

accommodations.name: Larchenheim
accommodations.description:
2* accommodation in an excellent location? If you're reading this, you've done well as these beds are snapped up as soon as they’re out.

The Gastehaus Larchenheim is located a stones throw from the Penkenbahn and Ahornbahn lift, so you can get from piste to pillow in no time. With mountain-view balconies and traditional alpine-style rooms, this hotel is perfect for those who want something cheap and cheerful but also in the midst of all the action.

accommodations.name: Hotel Perauer - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Located next to the Ahornbahn cable car in the centre of Mayrhofen, the Perauer is only a 5-minute walk from the Penkenbahn cable car and the bustling high street that forms the main spine of Snowbombing. Food and drink wise, this hotel rivals Hans the Butcher with a meat shop inside the hotel, as well as an excellent wine cellar. The modern spa area includes a sauna, a steam bath, a spa bath, water beds, and an infrared cabin. All rooms have been individually furnished in a rustic Tyrolean style and feature TV’s, en-suite, a hairdryer and a balcony, ideal for taking in that morning mountain air… There is also a ski boot drier and free private parking for those on the Road Trip.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Rauchenwalderhof - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Hotel Garni Rauchenwalderhof is located in Mayrhofen, It offers traditionally furnished accommodation with a private bathroom and views of the cable cars.

Each room and apartment has a safe. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchenette with kitchenware, a dishwasher and a dining area.

Guests can relax in the garden and make use of the small outdoor pool. Barbecue facilities are at guests’ disposal on the sunny terrace.

Hotel Rauchenwalderhof has a ski storage room. Penkenbahn and Ahornbahn Cable Car are 500 metres away. 

The centre of Mayrhofen with its bars and restaurants is a 10-minute walk away. Free limited private parking is offered at the hotel.

accommodations.name: 3 Bed Apartment -Downtown - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description:
Whether you’re travelling in a quad or perhaps a dream team of 8, we have apartments to suit each and every party size! These apartments are located in the 'Mayrhofen Districts', comprising of the surrounding villages just on the edge of the action, including; Eckartau, Laubichl, Hollenzen, Burgstall to the North and Hochstegen to the South. A leisurely walk, short taxi ride, or the free ski bus will take you to Snowbombing’s hub in no time at all. 

Apartments comprise of Austrian twin beds, bunk beds, sofa beds, a fully equipped kitchen and living areas perfect for pre-drinks. Some apartments also have a balcony available on a first come first served basis, so gather the troops quickly! Hurry – apartments will be allocated on a first come first served basis.

*Please note that the images shown are representative of the accommodation available but may not be the apartment you are allocated and layouts may vary.

accommodations.name: Elisabeth Hotel - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description: The jewel in the crown of Mayrhofen and the home of our headline artists, The Hotel Elisabeth is the first word in refined luxury and decadence. A verified 5* Hotel, the Elisabeth is just a 10 minute walk from the central Penkenbahn ski lift, and features a fantastic indoor pool, complete with sauna and steam baths. The rooms are decked out in elegant style, and feature balconies, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a spacious bathroom with bathtub or shower. If that isn’t enough, comfy slippers and bathrobes are also provided. The best possible way to live like a king whilst at Snowbombing. Stick that crown on and laugh with glee at your palatial surroundings…

accommodations.name: Solo Bombing - Gasthof Zillertal - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
‘Solo-bombing’ is back! These rooms are designed for the nomads of the Snowbombing land that want to travel the world (or Mayrhofen) solo and make many a pal along the way. 

Have no fear if your mates are making lame excuses not to book up as now you can choose a solo-bed in one of our luxury mixed dorms.

accommodations.name: Hypo Appartements - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description: Perfect for groups of 4 – 10, Hypo Apartments offer cozy rooms and a location that couldn’t be more in the thick of it if it tried. You can stagger up to the Penkenbahn ski lift in just three minutes each morning (it’s just 800 metres away) and each venue at the festival is within a 5-minute radius. If your gang are still looking to book up for SB18, get ready to get hyper for the Hypo!

accommodations.name: Gastehaus Huber
accommodations.description: We can’t believe this one is still on the market! The Gästehaus Huber is located downtown of Mayrhofen and boasts a stunning spa, well-equipped and cozy rooms and free Wi-Fi that is so fast that some Snowbombing staff members can often be found uploading documents in the lounge. If you’re after an excellent value stay with high comfort levels (and did we mention the Wi-Fi?) then you’ve bagged a beauty of a chalet here!

accommodations.name: Waldhaus Lechner - Apartments
accommodations.description: Perfect for a group of four, the Waldhaus Lechner is clean, spacious, well located and very well equipped to provide the perfect HQ for you and your mates whilst at Snowbombing. Beautiful views can be glimpsed from each window and balcony, the breakfasts are excellent and you’re close to the heart of the action. It’s one of the best priced options for groups we have!

accommodations.name: Huber Chalet (Alpen) - Apartments
accommodations.description: Prime spot Alert! Another authentic Tyrolean lodge that Heidi would be pleased to call home (not the DJ), Huber’s Chalet is just 300 metres from the centre of Mayrhofen but is tucked away enough to ensure a good night’s sleep is always enjoyed. With the Penkenbahn Cable Car just 3 minute’s walk and a decent Supermarket a stone’s throw away, this one’s a no-brainer really… The chalet holds 5 beds so is perfect for groups!

accommodations.name: Landhaus Daum Andrea - Apartments
accommodations.description: Ideal for bigger group sizes of 5 – 8, the Landhaus Daum offers a range of well equipped, stylish apartments that are the perfect spot for groups looking to do Snowbombing the proper way. With large kitchen and living areas, you have the ideal pre and post party venue, and all apartments come with a flat screen TV and spacious living room. Many boast stunning balconies with mountain views, and freshly baked bread can be requested each day. An excellent choice all round!

accommodations.name: Kostner - Apartments
accommodations.description: Perfect for groups sizes of five to nine, the Kostner not only exudes all the cozy charm of a classic Tyrolean guesthouse, but also bakes fresh bread on the premises each day – the perfect fuel for tackling the piste and the party! The breakfasts are legendary and there is even a café on the ground floor for more delightful treats. A solid central choice – snap it up before all that’s left is crumbs!

accommodations.name: Haus Wiesengrund  (Shared Facilities) - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description: The Haus Wiesengrund is situated on the outskirts of Mayrhofen, but just a quick jaunt to the heart of Snowbombing. Serene and quiet, great after a day on the piste when you really need to get your head down! There's a free ski bus nearby that takes you around town in minutes so you can go from pillow to piste to party and back again with ease. This comfy bnb also has gym facilities, free Wi-Fi, ski storage, a cosy living area and all rooms have private balconies. An excellent choice all round…

accommodations.name: 2 Bed Apartment - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Don’t delay, these get snapped up quicker than Carl Cox on a downhill toboggan! Great for groups who fancy a pocket-friendly, self-catering trip (the Austrian Supermarkets are mega cheap) - whether you’re travelling in a trio or rolling deep with your 10 best pals, we have apartments to suit each and every party size!

Apartments comprise of Austrian twin beds, bunk beds, sofa beds, fully equipped kitchens and living areas perfect for pre-drinks. Some apartments also have a balcony available on a first come first served basis, so gather the troops quickly! We cannot guarantee that everyone will have a separate bedroom area, so flip a coin for the sofa beds!

Like a fine wine or a tin of Quality Street, Snowbombing is best shared. Hurry – apartments will be allocated on a first-come-first-served basis.

accommodations.name: Gutshof - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description: This lovely 4-star hotel is located on the edges of Mayrhofen, only a stone’s throw from the Snowbombing action! The modern, tastefully furnished rooms offer free WiFi, balconies, cable TV, DVD players and a minibar, whilst all of the spacious rooms and suites have balconies, solid wooden furniture and big bathrooms with hairdryers and free toiletries. This is a top hotel for guests and artists alike so you may find yourself waiting for the toast machine behind Carl Cox… No joke.

accommodations.name: Hotel Landhaus zum Griena - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Just a 5-minute walk from the centre of Mayrhofen and the cable car, Landhaus zum Griena offers traditionally furnished rooms and apartments with a balcony or terrace and a bathroom-some facing out onto the main strip (often touted as the best fun you can have at Snowbombing…) It features a sauna and a bar-open late you’ll be pleased to know!  

Guests can relax on the sun terrace and in the garden, and there is a handy ski storage room with a ski boot dryer, and limited free parking is available on site for the Road Trip 

A supermarket and the ski bus stop to the Hintertux Glacier are 150 metres from the Griena, plus a  public outdoor pool is 800 metres away if you’e brave enough… 

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Aparthotel Veronika - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Just short walk from the town centre is the Apparthotel Veronika, a luxury 4 star resort that oozes quality. Tastefully and comfortably furnished, a recommended hearty breakfast is offered in the house each morning, a perfect way to fuel a day on the slopes. A wellness area will also prove the perfect tonic to soothe aching limbs once home, allowing you to recharge before hitting the tiles. All apartments are individually decorated with ensuites, hairdryers and WIFI access. The Apparthotel Veronika will truly allow for a chilled, serene Snowbombing experience...

PS: Smoking is only allowed on the balconies! Please note you must remove all of your clothing in order to use the sauna facilities at this hotel.

accommodations.description:
Guesthouse Garni Jennewein is centrally located in the heart of Mayrhofen meaning you are never far from all the Snowbombing venues, bars and restaurants, shops and ski-lifts. If you're keen then act fast as this one sells out uüber quick!

All of the comfortable rooms offer bath, shower, WC, balcony and cable TV. The guesthouse has 3 beautiful apartments sleeping 2-4 persons with 2 bedrooms, shower, WC, balcony, kitchen-living room with dishwasher, and even a microwave oven.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.name: Hotel Scheulinghof - In Town - Central Mayrhofen
accommodations.description:
Location alert! Hotel Scheulinghof, close to the centre of Mayrhofen, is a spacious and comfortable bed-and-breakfast located within 5 minutes’ walk of both cable car stations, the Arena, Bruck’n’Stadl and the Glacier bus stop.

Relax in the sauna or play ping pong to your heart’s content/ The Scheulinghof is a great Mayrhofen base – it’s just a shame we can’t say its name properly.

Please note: This hotel operates a no swimwear in the spa policy, although towels are ok. Don't be shy!

accommodations.description: Eye catchingly Tyrolean, the Alpina is a one-stop shop for an authentically awesome Alpine experience (hence the name). Expect comfy beds, lovely wooden architecture and a warm welcome from the staff. A very solid choice – plus it’s handily near to the centre town and ski lifts. Winning!

accommodations.name: Gasthof Hochsteg - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
Offering an idyllic holiday destination in unparalleled natural surroundings, the Gasthof Hochsteg is situated between the spectacular Tuxer Ravine and the Zemm Canyon. The in-house restaurant is open daily from 5.30 to 10.00p.m. serving delicious international and regional cuisine. We also offer a wide range of schnapps and liqueurs, thirst quenching drinks, imaginative cocktails and a varied selection of international fine wines in our lovely restaurant, or on one of the sundrenched terraces.

The comfortable guest rooms are equipped with shower/WC, flat screen TV, Safe and most have a balcony. Many rooms enjoy spectacular views over Mayrhofen and the surrounding mountains. Bosh!

accommodations.name: Gasthof Weinstadl - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description: In the centre of Hippach, the homely guesthouse Gasthof Weinstadl boasts a selection of great facilities, including a sauna and solarium, table tennis, a sunbathing area to catch those spring rays, lift and a big parking bay (especially handy for those on the Road Trip). Rooms come equipped with shower/WC/TV and that classic Tyrolean charm. A great choice all round!

rooms.name: Austrian Twin/Double
rooms.description: Festival Ticket Included

accommodations.name: Garberwirt - Zillertal Valley
accommodations.description:
The charming Garberwirt is 700 metres from the centre of Hippach and offers a super spa area with a Finnish sauna, a steam bath to soothe limbs after a bruising day on the piste. The on-site restaurant serves international cuisine. The closest ski area Horberg can be reached within a 5-minute drive. All rooms come with a TV and a safety deposit box, and a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer is standard in every room. Some rooms have a balcony that overlooks a stunning mountain vista… Fingers crossed it’s yours.

The hotel comes with a wine cellar and a bar, plus you can play table tennis and use a ski storage room at the hotel. Free private parking is possible on site and garage parking is available against a surcharge… All in all, the Garberwirt contains what you need for a good, simple accommodation choice at Snowbombing.

accommodations.name: Gästehaus zum Gachtna - Down Town
accommodations.description: Situated in a beautiful, quiet position on the southern outskirts of Mayrhofen. Directly next to the bus stop for the free ski bus to the lifts and the Hintertuxer glacier. Ski cloakroom and drying room. An excellent restaurant can be found next door, and a supermarket is close by. A beautiful garden, breakfast terrace, sun bathing area with deck chairs, traditional lounge help seal the deal.

rooms.name: Austrian Twin/Double
rooms.description: Extremely comfortable room with shower/WC, TV, radio, armchair, settee, hand basin.

accommodations.name: Rauchenwalderhof - Apartment
accommodations.description: Perfect for a group of four, the Rauchenwalderhof is a family run guesthouse that will welcome you with open arms (every morning if you ask them nicely). Surrounded by the stunning scenery of the Mayrhofen mountains, gather your gang and plump for this well-equipped and well located guesthouse that boasts jaw dropping views from each window.

accommodations.name: Pension Ferienhof Widner  - Mayrhofen Districts
accommodations.description: A typically Austrian, quaint guesthouse located in the nearby village of Swendau, The Pension Ferienhof Widner offers a warm welcome and true Tyrolean hospitality in bucketfuls. The hosts Andrea and Jenson embody the warm welcoming spirit that's typical across this region, and the hotel is just a short hop, skip and jump to the centre of Mayrhofen. With comfortable rooms and en suites, the Widner is the perfect choice for those looking to choose a central but affordable option…
